item.title: Selamat Datang
item.description: Di blog ini saya akan berbagi pengalaman tentang programming, desain dan beberapa hal lainnya yang menjadi hobi saya

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person.
